name: Be careful
description:
The game jam lasted 3 days. And the topic was: Take Care.

The theme

I have interpreted the subject in the way many likely have done. I have associated take care with virus, infections and other things.

Controls Keyboard 

You can move the player with W A S D or the arrow keys.

Press the left mouse button to shoot towards the mouse cursor position.

Press the space bar to take your mask on or off.

Creator

This is a game by Ryder Studios.

It's made by  only Daniel Münstermann.

He's a developer, 2D Artist and Sounddesigner.
